description:
This collection of dashboards (**Hardware Sentry**) leverages the [`hw.*` metrics](/metric/summary?filter=hw.) collected by [Hardware Sentry OpenTelemetry Collector](https://www.sentrysoftware.com/products/hardware-sentry-opentelemetry-collector.html).

| Dashboard | Description |
|---|---|
| **Hardware Sentry - Observability & Sustainability** (this dashboard) | Overview of all monitored hosts, with a focus on sustainability |
| [Hardware Sentry - Site](/dash/integration/Hardware%20Sentry%20-%20Site) | Metrics associated to one *site* (a data center or a server room) and its monitored *hosts* |
| [Hardware Sentry - Host](/dash/integration/Hardware%20Sentry%20-%20Host) | Metrics associated to one *host* and its internal devices |

This main dashboard focuses on the energy usage and carbon emissions of your data centers and server rooms.

**Click on a bar in the graphs to navigate to the dashboard of the selected *site* with more details about its energy usage and the monitored hosts.**
title: Hardware Sentry - Main
